description: This file defines the ChatService class, providing methods to send messages to a chatbot or live chat system via an API client, including error handling.

classes.name: ChatService
classes.description: A service class responsible for communicating with a chat backend, sending messages, and handling related errors.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a message to the chat server and returns a ChatMessage object upon success.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles Dio exceptions, providing user-friendly error messages based on response data or network issues.
